summary: Smart Study Buddy: A beginner-friendly study app for Class 8-12 students with daily planner, Pomodoro timer, notes, flashcards, exam countdown, AI assistant, and progress tracking
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly study buddy mascot illustration for app icon and dashboard (study-buddy-mascot.dim_256x256.png)
- Calm study environment hero banner with desk and books for landing area (study-hero.dim_1200x400.png)
- Simple subject icons set including Science, Maths, English, History, Geography (subject-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a Daily Study Planner where users can add subjects (Science, Maths, English, etc.), set study time for each subject, and view a simple timetable displaying all planned study sessions
Create a Pomodoro Focus Timer with 25-minute focus sessions and 5-minute breaks, including start, pause, and reset controls, and display motivational messages after each completed session
Build a Notes Section where users can write and save short notes, organize notes by subject, and edit or delete existing notes easily
Implement a Flashcards Mode for quick revision where users can create flashcards with questions on the front and answers on the back, and swipe through cards for review
Create an Exam Countdown feature where users can add exam dates and view the number of days remaining until each exam on the dashboard

Build an AI Study Assistant chatbot that explains topics in easy, beginner-friendly language, responds like a friendly teacher, and provides short, clear explanations to help students understand concepts
Implement a Progress Tracker that displays daily study streak, tracks total hours studied per day, and shows progress through a simple visual progress bar

Design a minimal, beginner-friendly UI with a light theme using soft, calming colors (avoiding overwhelming blues and purples), large easy-to-tap buttons, clear readable text, and a mobile-responsive layout suitable for students
